title: Fix currency handling to always use USD during product upload

requirements.summary: Ensure ProductForm always stores and transmits prices in USD dollars without currency conversion
acceptanceCriteria: When a product is created with a price of $25.00, the stored price is 25.00 (USD dollars), not 2500 cents or a pounds equivalent.
No currency conversion function is applied to the price value in ProductForm before submitting to the backend.
The price displayed after product creation matches the exact dollar amount entered by the admin.

file_operations.description: Remove any currency conversion logic (e.g., multiplication by 100 or exchange rate conversion) applied to the price field before submitting to backend. Ensure the price value is transmitted as-is in USD dollars. Verify that both create and edit flows preserve the dollar amount exactly as entered by the admin.

requirements.summary: Remove currency conversion from cart, checkout, and order item total calculations
acceptanceCriteria: A cart item with a unit price of $25.00 and quantity 2 displays a line total of $50.00.
No pound (£) symbol or pence values appear anywhere in cart, checkout, or order summary.
Totals are never multiplied by 100 (cents conversion) or divided/multiplied by an exchange rate.

file_operations.description: Audit and remove any currency conversion logic applied to item prices or line totals. Ensure item totals are calculated as price (USD dollars) × quantity with no multiplication by 100 or exchange rate conversion. Display all prices with the $ symbol and in dollar format (e.g., $25.00).

Remove any currency conversion or cents calculation from order total display. Ensure the order total is shown in USD dollars matching the backend total without conversion. Verify that no pounds or pence values appear in the checkout summary.

Ensure item prices and totals displayed in order history are in USD dollars without conversion. Remove any logic that converts backend price values to cents or another currency. Display all monetary values with $ symbol.

Verify that product prices (base and variant) are displayed in USD dollars without conversion. If any conversion logic exists for price display, remove it. Ensure variant-specific pricing shows the exact dollar amount from the backend.
Ensure product prices shown on product cards are displayed in USD dollars without conversion. Remove any currency conversion applied to the price value before display.
